Still buying your web hosting from humanized alligators and turkeys? Stop wasting your money this holiday season, and get a whole lot more for your hard earned dollars.

This holiday, treat yourself to something special from HostMyBytes. With our holiday bundles you can buy something for yourself and get a free gift to give to others! Go ahead you deserve a treat, and your friends deserve better hosting. 

We won't tell if you keep it all for yourself.

**WHAT ARE CLOUD VPS RESOURCE POOLS** – Our OpenVZ Cloud Resource Pools are what
others call cloud. We give you a hefty allocation of resources that you can dice up into different VPSes on demand across our four locations. Unfamiliar with VPS Resource Pools? We have a page that explains them more:
http://hostmybytes.com/resource-pools.php 
(Available in: 1. Phoenix, Arizona, USA 2. Jacksonville, Florida 3. Quebec, Canada 4. Strasbourg, France)

![](http://hostmybytes.com/images/worldMap.png)

**SHARED CPANEL **– Includes everything you need to get started today with web hosting + DNS + email + many more features. Yes, we will migrate your accounts for free from any other host that uses cPanel.
(Available in: 1. Los Angeles, California, USA 2. Nuremberg, Germany 3. Maidenhead, United
Kingdon 4. Brisbane, Australia)

**About HostMyBytes**

HostMyBytes started selling hosting in 2014. We offer cheap web hosting from data centers around the planet. No matter where you are with your needs we have something for you; from entry level cPanel shared hosting all the way up to large resource KVM servers. We have dedicated servers available too! Contact us for pricing [link to: https://clients.hostmybytes.com/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=3].

**Here are Five Reasons to Choose HostMyBytes**

1. Care: We work hard to satisfy our valued customers
2. Guarantee: 30-Day money back satisfaction guarantee for new customers
3. Power: Xeon many core powered servers with RAID drive arrays
4. Choice: Many locations to choose from
5. Available: Customer Support with 24x7 coverage

Need something different? We can arrange custom packages to meet your needs. Let's talk about how HostMyBytes can serve you. 
[link to: https://clients.hostmybytes.com/submitticket.php].
